participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, with a love for animals and community service.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Lukas
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, with a passion for thrill-seeking activities and a love for innovative cooking.
participant_2.background: hello i just moved here from germany. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i do like watching cooking shows. i am a vegan and i love hummus.
